LANDING.TITLE: Begin our eco-awareness assessment to discover your environmental impact, and let us help you improve it

USER.TITLE: Please fill the form below to continue
USER.LABELCHECK: By sending this form, you agree to us getting in contact with you via the email address provided.

RESULT.LABEL1: Having completed the Pre-assessment Checklist, you've primed your project or organizational planning with CPSI considerations. This step illuminates your current sustainability standing and identifies areas for growth, enhancing your project's objectives and overall sustainability efforts
RESULT.LABEL3: By navigating through six category tabs and assessing 67 credits, you've evaluated your project's alignment with sustainable practices. Each credit's intent, metric, and assessment questions provided guidance, forming a detailed sustainability profile. Remember, unanswered questions default to 'no', stressing the importance of thorough engagement.
RESULT.LABEL4: Regarding your score, remember it's a starting point, offering an estimate rather than a final verdict. Use the insights gained to guide your next steps, whether that's deepening current commitments or broadening your approach.
RESULT.LABEL5: For further guidance and to enhance your sustainability journey, join our community at joinus@green-cross.org.uk. Your proactive steps today pave the way for a more sustainable tomorrow.
